markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barkskin Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=184)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 562 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you drink this bitter draft, your skin thickens like bark. You gain the effects of a 2nd-level [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20) spell for 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Barkskin Potion
